biotools.summary: multiSyncPy is a Python package for assessing multivariate coordination dynamics. The package supports the burgeoning field of research into synchrony, making accessible a set of methods for studying group-level rather than dyadic constructs of synchrony and/or coordination. We offer a range of metrics for estimating mulivariate synchrony based on a collection of those used in recent literature.
